title: Trimming, 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic thread
Technique: tapestry weave
description: Gold trimming with occasional tapestry inserts of geometrical forms in silver, blue, red, pink and green. Slit tapestry separations.

19th century. Medium: silk, metallic thread
